block.p: Dr. Katherine Donovan Bodkin and Scott Arthur Robinson were married on Friday in Larchmont, N.Y. The Rev. Luke Travers, a Roman Catholic priest and a cousin of the bride, performed the ceremony at the Church of SS. John and Paul.

The bride, 33, is a veterinarian at the Westside Veterinary Center in Manhattan. She graduated from Middlebury College and Tufts University School of Veterinary Medicine. She is a daughter of Mimsi and Laurence Bodkin of Larchmont. Her father is a partner in Jackson & Nash, a law firm in Manhattan. Her mother is the vice president for customer relations at the White Rock Products Corporation, a beverage company in Whitestone, Queens.

Dr. Katherine Donovan Bodkin and Scott Arthur Robinson were married on Friday in Larchmont, N.Y. The Rev. Luke Travers, a Roman Catholic priest and a cousin of the bride, performed the ceremony at the Church of SS. John and Paul.

The bride, 33, is a veterinarian at the Westside Veterinary Center in Manhattan. She graduated from Middlebury College and Tufts University School of Veterinary Medicine. She is a daughter of Mimsi and Laurence Bodkin of Larchmont. Her father is a partner in Jackson & Nash, a law firm in Manhattan. Her mother is the vice president for customer relations at the White Rock Products Corporation, a beverage company in Whitestone, Queens.

The bridegroom, 33, is a credit analyst in the insurance department at Moody's Investor Services in Manhattan. He graduated from Duke and received a master's degree in actuarial science from Georgia State University. He is the son of Charlotte and Arthur Robinson of Riverside, Conn. His mother, who is retired, taught the fourth grade at Greenwich Academy in Greenwich, Conn. His father retired as the director of information services at Wood Logan Associates, an annuity sales and marketing company that was in Old Greenwich, Conn.
